SEARCH
Package com.glitchybyte.glib.concurrent.eventhandler

Class GEventHandlerTask

java.lang.Object
com.glitchybyte.glib.concurrent.GTask
com.glitchybyte.glib.concurrent.eventhandler.GEventHandlerTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
GEventHandler, GEventSender, Runnable
public final class GEventHandlerTask extends GTask implements GEventHandler
Event handler task.

Designed to broadcast events in a single worker thread, but without blocking the event receiver queue.
